title: 107_s2867
content: Amends the Agricultural Marketing Act of 1946 to establish minimum per plant per reporting day purchase and slaughter requirements through spot purchases from nonaffiliated producers for a covered packer: (1) that is a cooperative. And (2) that is not a cooperative. Sets forth transitional requirements for a covered packer with a specified captive cattle supply. Defines cooperative association of producers, covered packer, nonaffiliated producer, spot market sale, and reasonable competitive bidding opportunity.
